Name: Shabti belonging to Nestanebisheru
Description: Shabti belonging to Nestanebisheru, Great Mistress of the Concubines of the Harem of Amun. She was the daughter of the First Prophet of Amun, Pinudjem II and of Nesykhons. The wig, the eyes, the agricultural equipment and the inscription are painted in black, the latter arranged in five vertical columns all around the body. We know her titles thanks to other shabtis mentioning these.
